phrs.translation: 付出极大代价而获得的胜利

sentences.sentence: He had notched up more than 25 victories worldwide.
sentences.translation: 他已在世界范围内赢得了超过25次的胜利。

sentences.sentence: Military strategists had devised a plan that guaranteed a series of stunning victories.
sentences.translation: 军事战略家们设计了一个保证了一系列惊人胜利的计划。

sentences.sentence: Many small victories add up to a big one.
